content: oh here I'm gonna use an old cutting board to start and I have some TP and
I'm gonna pull it out into sheets and just put a few sheets on there and I'm
gonna spray it with some water and then add some white glue to it okay and just
get a generous bit of white glue in there then I'm gonna fold them up put
some more water and white glue on it and then just kind of roll them up into
bolder shapes okay add some more glue and that will
solidify those and another technique that you do is just put some TP in the
water and then roll them into bolder shapes and then add the glue like you
did before so now I spray paint these black flat black and ready for the next
steps I'm use a gray and this tray is really gonna help with this stage
because it's being messy so I'm gonna get my brush a bit wet and then just
start applying the grey to these stones now the tray is really helping because
I'm it's helping me turn them around and without them flying everywhere a little
bit on my hands but hey that's the craft so just keep doing those until I have
those all covered in grey and I'm satisfied with them so there we go now
I'm gonna start adding some color I'm gonna add a burnt umber to give some
variation in color and I'm gonna use a coffee also that'll give another
variation in color so I'll blend that into the stone and get a really nice
color there now let these dry and I'm gonna use a light grey to highlight
these okay so I'll use a wide brush and I'll just start rolling those in my hand
and highlighting with the light grey now this will really bring out the detail in
that toilet paper that crippled up toilet paper or will they look like
boulders so just keep going through those and adding the highlight getting
them all ready and those are looking good I'm gonna have a lot of these
suckers so throughout my players so here we go they're all dried up I
think they really look nice and one nice thing about these is they're really
light and that's gonna be important in the next phase because I want to show
you why here in a second so yeah I think those look great
zero we have our adventures and they're going down a hall and the Rogues like
wait I think I hear something I think I see something so she goes and checks it
out thinking she might see a trap and unfortunately she doesn't decide it in
time and boom bunch of boulders fall onto her from the
ceiling she could be trapped the players are like what let's help her and they
move up now if she made a saving throw you could have it so she actually goes
to the other side of the boulders and she's trapped on the other side and the
players have to get around to her or if she did made a good-enough same floor
you could have she escapes to the party here's another setup where the players
are going up the hill up in outside terrain and they hear it rumbling and
all of a sudden boom a huge avalanche comes rumbling down and you know
depending on their saving throws they might get out of the way unfortunately
the poor mage did not make it and he's buried in rubble so there you go that's
some nice little tricks you can do with these light boulders hey you yeah you
back here huh I know is short what would he expect there was a short tip watching
longer episodes if you want Jesus quit bugging me hey and make sure you join
